column4: had anyone got a speedtouch 510 ? i've wasted several hours and i still dont have a simple port forward

its a modem with built in router, yes
DSL huh?
yes (dynamic ip)
Honestly, best bet is to get a pure DSL modem, chuck the integrated router AT&T locks those suckers tight
i use it as pure ADSL modem, i got a seperate router :-)
DHCP from the modem = OFF
its jsut that i can't forwards a port with this weird thing
I'm stumped then, honestly when confronted with that integrated crap, I just dug out a modem without a router from my salvage :P

try Craig's List I've seen DSL modems still wrapped floating around in there
